summary: can i please get an enby (idk if there's a masc version of the flag but if so yes pls) bi izuku?
question: can i please get an enby (idk if there's a masc version of the flag but if so yes pls) bi izuku?
answer:
Of course!

I couldn’t find a masc ver of the nb flag, but there’s two transparent ones if you or someone else does!!

In order: NB flag, Bi flag, NB Bi flag (by @wuvsbian ), Transparent background with all three flags in the pins, and transparent background with transparent pins.

If you want another version, just let me know!!!

Credit if used. Requests are open!

title: The Real Housewives Of Class 1-A
description:
by IMALESBEAN

Class 1-A makes a groupchat, too bad everyone is a crackhead.

Words: 897, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia

  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Asui Tsuyu, Yaoyorozu Momo, Tokoyami Fumikage, Kaminari Denki, Kirishima Eijirou, Todoroki Shouto, Ashido Mina, Aoyama Yuuga, Jirou Kyouka, Shouji Mezou, Ojiro Mashirao, Sero Hanta, Hagakure Tooru, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Todoroki Shouto/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Uraraka Ochako, Ashido Mina/Asui Tsuyu, Shouji Mezou/Tokoyami Fumikage, Hagakure Tooru/Ojiro Mashirao, Kaminari Denki/Sero Hanta, Dabi/Hawks (My Hero Academia)

title: Wishing for words unsaid
description:
by trouble2381

Bakugou Katsuki had moved away shortly after graduation for an unknown reason, he told no one why and didn’t answer when people asked. Now forced to go back by his new hero agency he must confront his mistake.

title: BNHA Pirate AU
body:
I’m sorry. I just really like making and or fixing aus. i read an amazing fic called The Lost Continent, and it was fantastic. It inspired me to make this post. So thank you to the author of it, it was a wonderful read, and keep up the good work.

(let’s just say that this is set in England instead of Japan)                                   The great pirate ship One For All was known as the greatest ship and crew to ever set sail. Tales of the great man and women who manned the vessel were always circulating around pirate ports. The tale of the great Captain Yagi and his second in command Aizawa leaving the navy to become pirates, and further as they amassed a small crew. The two collected all sorts of people from all around the globe; including a prostitute, a noble symphonist, and the eldest son of a family of messengers. The One For All crew was the best of family and friends they could ever ask for. 

But one day, the Captain disappeared . No one other than the crew knew what had transpired. Rumors that he’d been killed, taken ill, or left the life behind ran rampant in the streets of pirate towns like Barneck Island, Tortuga, and much of the like. Only one was true, and Yagi, ever clever Yagi, was sure to have a successor. No one knew who the successor was, until a deckhand of another ship saw the great pirate leading a noble woman onto the ship, a small boy in her arms. The captain had a child! “He would be raised into this life,” Yagi commanded,” so his noble morals don’t get in the way.” Slowly, some of the great crew left the One For All, in search of crews of their own. They had to build the crew back up, and they had the perfect way. The ship traveled to Barneck, the biggest pirate city in history, and collected small children. Orphans and the like. The crew would raise them for what was left of their childhoods. Families found each other and great bonds were forged in iron. The second in command and navigator found a son, a young boy blessed with powerful magic. The messenger’s son brought along his little brother, a studious young boy who took to learning the ship like gospel. And a little girl, shunned by her family for being of color and strange, yellow, cat-like eyes was taken in by the prostitute.

 Years go by, and Yagi’s young successor grows up surrounded by friends and family, but he knew there could be more. He asks his father to dock the ship in a royal, and, against his better judgement and Aizawa’s, did so. The boy, with a few of his closest friends, ran into the city to recruit more for the crew. They stumbled upon a blacksmith’s son, a drunken bard’s daughter, and a shy girl who had no story. The young Iida, Tenya, took two of them back to the ship while the young successor, Izuku, a swamp girl, Tsu, and the bard’s daughter, Jirou, continued to search. The ran out of the city, and a large castle loomed over them. Izuku looked at the gate, labeled “Todoroki Family Estate”. He smiled and looked to his friends. Tsu seemed hesitant, as she always was when entering enclosed spaces, but Jirou knodded, quickly telling of the patriarch of the family and his treachery. The entered through the kitchens, blending in as young servants, and snuck into was looked like a children’s area. Sitting there were four young souls, two boys and two girls. Izuku recognized one, an old friend from when he was a simple nursemaid’s son. Jirou pointed to the other boy and the taller girl,saying their names were Todoroki Shouto and Yaoyorozu Momo, betrothed heads of their respective families. Tsu just stared at the final girl, eyes wide in awe. Izuku snapped he out of it and coughed. The children’s attention was immediately on him, and he waved shyly. The Yaoyorozu girl smiled,” Yes? How can we help you?” 

Izuku opened his mouth, but Jirou cut him off.”You wanna become pirates with us?!” Tsu quickly shushed her, and then all went silent for the response. The blonde boy scoffed,” Why would we-””Yes.” the young Todoroki boy answered. Izuku smiled,” Anyone else?” The blonde just notices him,” Fucking Deku?! If you’re a fucking pirate, i gotta be a better one!” The blonde proclaims with a stomp. Tsu looked to the girls,” It’s okay if you don’t. We’re not forcing you.” The smaller of the girls grinned, her puffy cheeks blushing in delight.” I wanna!” She hopped off her seat and ran over to were they were. All eyes were now on Yaoyorozu. She shook her head and giggled,” No way i’m leaving. I gotta be here to set you free if any of you get caught! But consider me an ally,” She got up and kissed Jirou’s cheek.” You might wanna go now. I can her the guards coming.” She walked away, leaving a flushed Jirou and a group of confused children. Izuku chimed up,” You heard the lady. Let’s go.” They escape the castle and run back to the ship. Yagi congratulates them on the successful mission and yells to set sail. 

Turns out the would need Momo’s help as a year later the blacksmith’s son, Kirishima, would get caught trying to steal jewelry from a noblewoman. The whole crew is know by then, and he is captued. Sure as all, Momo frees him from an early death by way of hangman’s noose. When asked why he stole the jewelry, he replied,” I was trying to get something nice for Bakugou because i think he’s really pretty!” Bakugou kissed him on the spot, and then slapped him, and then kissed him again. The whole crew cheered and had a party that day celebrating their love, and the arrival of a new member, a young giant named Shouji.

Jirou followed soon after, this time just trying to see Momo. She’s wrote a song for the noble girl and wanted desperately to sing it for her. Momo’s guards thought she was just a delinquent boy trying to cop a feel. To be fair, Jirou WOULD like to cop a feel, but not without permission. She’s a gentlelady. Once again, Momo unlocked the cell she was kept in, but not before having a few kisses from her,” pirate love.” Everyone knew what had happened when Jirou can back to the ship smiling like a happy drunk.

The third time that was related to love was a newer crew member named Sero trying to free his best friend Kaminari from his slavery to a noble family. Denki escaped his slavery, and Sero would have died a happy man, but Yaoyorozu freed him anyway. When they got back to the ship, Yaoyorozu coming this time, something about a new suitor, Denki immediately kiss Sero on the lips. Sero was already with the second in command’s son, but Hitoshi was fine with it. The three proceeded to ignore the rest of the ships for the entire day and spend it in Sero’s room doing god knows what.

that’s all for now. thnak you for reading!

Tsu seemed hesitant, as she always was when entering enclosed spaces, but Jirou knodded, quickly telling of the patriarch of the family and his treachery. The entered through the kitchens, blending in as young servants, and snuck into was looked like a children’s area. Sitting there were four young souls, two boys and two girls. Izuku recognized one, an old friend from when he was a simple nursemaid’s son. Jirou pointed to the other boy and the taller girl,saying their names were Todoroki Shouto and Yaoyorozu Momo, betrothed heads of their respective families. Tsu just stared at the final girl, eyes wide in awe. Izuku snapped he out of it and coughed. The children’s attention was immediately on him, and he waved shyly. The Yaoyorozu girl smiled,” Yes? How can we help you?” 

Izuku opened his mouth, but Jirou cut him off.”You wanna become pirates with us?!” Tsu quickly shushed her, and then all went silent for the response. The blonde boy scoffed,” Why would we-””Yes.” the young Todoroki boy answered. Izuku smiled,” Anyone else?” The blonde just notices him,” Fucking Deku?! If you’re a fucking pirate, i gotta be a better one!” The blonde proclaims with a stomp. Tsu looked to the girls,” It’s okay if you don’t. We’re not forcing you.” The smaller of the girls grinned, her puffy cheeks blushing in delight.” I wanna!” She hopped off her seat and ran over to were they were. All eyes were now on Yaoyorozu. She shook her head and giggled,” No way i’m leaving. I gotta be here to set you free if any of you get caught! But consider me an ally,” She got up and kissed Jirou’s cheek.” You might wanna go now. I can her the guards coming.” She walked away, leaving a flushed Jirou and a group of confused children. Izuku chimed up,” You heard the lady. Let’s go.” They escape the castle and run back to the ship. Yagi congratulates them on the successful mission and yells to set sail. 

Turns out the would need Momo’s help as a year later the blacksmith’s son, Kirishima, would get caught trying to steal jewelry from a noblewoman. The whole crew is know by then, and he is captued. Sure as all, Momo frees him from an early death by way of hangman’s noose. When asked why he stole the jewelry, he replied,” I was trying to get something nice for Bakugou because i think he’s really pretty!” Bakugou kissed him on the spot, and then slapped him, and then kissed him again. The whole crew cheered and had a party that day celebrating their love, and the arrival of a new member, a young giant named Shouji.

Jirou followed soon after, this time just trying to see Momo. She’s wrote a song for the noble girl and wanted desperately to sing it for her. Momo’s guards thought she was just a delinquent boy trying to cop a feel. To be fair, Jirou WOULD like to cop a feel, but not without permission. She’s a gentlelady. Once again, Momo unlocked the cell she was kept in, but not before having a few kisses from her,” pirate love.” Everyone knew what had happened when Jirou can back to the ship smiling like a happy drunk.

The third time that was related to love was a newer crew member named Sero trying to free his best friend Kaminari from his slavery to a noble family. Denki escaped his slavery, and Sero would have died a happy man, but Yaoyorozu freed him anyway. When they got back to the ship, Yaoyorozu coming this time, something about a new suitor, Denki immediately kiss Sero on the lips. Sero was already with the second in command’s son, but Hitoshi was fine with it. The three proceeded to ignore the rest of the ships for the entire day and spend it in Sero’s room doing god knows what.

that’s all for now. thnak you for reading!

trail.content_raw:
I’m sorry. I just really like making and or fixing aus. i read an amazing fic called The Lost Continent, and it was fantastic. It inspired me to make this post. So thank you to the author of it, it was a wonderful read, and keep up the good work.

(let’s just say that this is set in England instead of Japan)                                   The great pirate ship One For All was known as the greatest ship and crew to ever set sail. Tales of the great man and women who manned the vessel were always circulating around pirate ports. The tale of the great Captain Yagi and his second in command Aizawa leaving the navy to become pirates, and further as they amassed a small crew. The two collected all sorts of people from all around the globe; including a prostitute, a noble symphonist, and the eldest son of a family of messengers. The One For All crew was the best of family and friends they could ever ask for. 

But one day, the Captain disappeared . No one other than the crew knew what had transpired. Rumors that he’d been killed, taken ill, or left the life behind ran rampant in the streets of pirate towns like Barneck Island, Tortuga, and much of the like. Only one was true, and Yagi, ever clever Yagi, was sure to have a successor. No one knew who the successor was, until a deckhand of another ship saw the great pirate leading a noble woman onto the ship, a small boy in her arms. The captain had a child! “He would be raised into this life,” Yagi commanded,” so his noble morals don’t get in the way.” Slowly, some of the great crew left the One For All, in search of crews of their own. They had to build the crew back up, and they had the perfect way. The ship traveled to Barneck, the biggest pirate city in history, and collected small children. Orphans and the like. The crew would raise them for what was left of their childhoods. Families found each other and great bonds were forged in iron. The second in command and navigator found a son, a young boy blessed with powerful magic. The messenger’s son brought along his little brother, a studious young boy who took to learning the ship like gospel. And a little girl, shunned by her family for being of color and strange, yellow, cat-like eyes was taken in by the prostitute.

 Years go by, and Yagi’s young successor grows up surrounded by friends and family, but he knew there could be more. He asks his father to dock the ship in a royal, and, against his better judgement and Aizawa’s, did so. The boy, with a few of his closest friends, ran into the city to recruit more for the crew. They stumbled upon a blacksmith’s son, a drunken bard’s daughter, and a shy girl who had no story. The young Iida, Tenya, took two of them back to the ship while the young successor, Izuku, a swamp girl, Tsu, and the bard’s daughter, Jirou, continued to search. The ran out of the city, and a large castle loomed over them. Izuku looked at the gate, labeled “Todoroki Family Estate”. He smiled and looked to his friends. Tsu seemed hesitant, as she always was when entering enclosed spaces, but Jirou knodded, quickly telling of the patriarch of the family and his treachery. The entered through the kitchens, blending in as young servants, and snuck into was looked like a children’s area. Sitting there were four young souls, two boys and two girls. Izuku recognized one, an old friend from when he was a simple nursemaid’s son. Jirou pointed to the other boy and the taller girl,saying their names were Todoroki Shouto and Yaoyorozu Momo, betrothed heads of their respective families. Tsu just stared at the final girl, eyes wide in awe. Izuku snapped he out of it and coughed. The children’s attention was immediately on him, and he waved shyly. The Yaoyorozu girl smiled,” Yes? How can we help you?” 

Izuku opened his mouth, but Jirou cut him off.”You wanna become pirates with us?!” Tsu quickly shushed her, and then all went silent for the response. The blonde boy scoffed,” Why would we-””Yes.” the young Todoroki boy answered. Izuku smiled,” Anyone else?” The blonde just notices him,” Fucking Deku?! If you’re a fucking pirate, i gotta be a better one!” The blonde proclaims with a stomp. Tsu looked to the girls,” It’s okay if you don’t. We’re not forcing you.” The smaller of the girls grinned, her puffy cheeks blushing in delight.” I wanna!” She hopped off her seat and ran over to were they were. All eyes were now on Yaoyorozu. She shook her head and giggled,” No way i’m leaving. I gotta be here to set you free if any of you get caught! But consider me an ally,” She got up and kissed Jirou’s cheek.” You might wanna go now. I can her the guards coming.” She walked away, leaving a flushed Jirou and a group of confused children. Izuku chimed up,” You heard the lady. Let’s go.” They escape the castle and run back to the ship. Yagi congratulates them on the successful mission and yells to set sail. 

Turns out the would need Momo’s help as a year later the blacksmith’s son, Kirishima, would get caught trying to steal jewelry from a noblewoman. The whole crew is know by then, and he is captued. Sure as all, Momo frees him from an early death by way of hangman’s noose. When asked why he stole the jewelry, he replied,” I was trying to get something nice for Bakugou because i think he’s really pretty!” Bakugou kissed him on the spot, and then slapped him, and then kissed him again. The whole crew cheered and had a party that day celebrating their love, and the arrival of a new member, a young giant named Shouji.

Jirou followed soon after, this time just trying to see Momo. She’s wrote a song for the noble girl and wanted desperately to sing it for her. Momo’s guards thought she was just a delinquent boy trying to cop a feel. To be fair, Jirou WOULD like to cop a feel, but not without permission. She’s a gentlelady. Once again, Momo unlocked the cell she was kept in, but not before having a few kisses from her,” pirate love.” Everyone knew what had happened when Jirou can back to the ship smiling like a happy drunk.

The third time that was related to love was a newer crew member named Sero trying to free his best friend Kaminari from his slavery to a noble family. Denki escaped his slavery, and Sero would have died a happy man, but Yaoyorozu freed him anyway. When they got back to the ship, Yaoyorozu coming this time, something about a new suitor, Denki immediately kiss Sero on the lips. Sero was already with the second in command’s son, but Hitoshi was fine with it. The three proceeded to ignore the rest of the ships for the entire day and spend it in Sero’s room doing god knows what.

that’s all for now. thnak you for reading!

summary: Don't sleep with demons (seriously, don't do it)
title: Don't sleep with demons (seriously, don't do it)
body:
by Cookies_101

Tomura has been working for 3 straight days. Dabi comes in…but something’s off.

Words: 3525, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Dabi (My Hero Academia), Toga Himiko, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia), Sako Atsuhiro | Mr. Compress, Bubaigawara Jin | Twice, Iguchi Shuuichi | Spinner, Mustard (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko
  • Additional Tags: Demons, AU, kind of, Implied Sexual Content, Kissing, Badly written kissing scenes, Ahmya Kawashiro (OC), Joseph Perez (OC), incubus


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/19294027

summary: Kirishima: Bakugou, please keep an eye on Midoriya today. He’s going to say something to the wrong person and get himself...
body:
Kirishima: Bakugou, please keep an eye on Midoriya today. He’s going to say something to the wrong person and get himself punched.

Bakugou: Sure, I’d love to see Deku get punched.

Kirishima: Try again.

Bakugou: I will stop Deku from getting punched.

Bakugou: I will stop Deku from getting punched.
trail.content:
Kirishima: Bakugou, please keep an eye on Midoriya today. He’s going to say something to the wrong person and get himself punched.

Bakugou: Sure, I’d love to see Deku get punched.

Kirishima: Try again.

Bakugou: I will stop Deku from getting punched.
